thread.title: theresa hardy

author: theresa hardy
title: theresa hardy
text: this was my first time ordering from here today, I placed my order and tried to pay with PayPal it did not take any payment. I then chose to place an order again with a credit card and they took the order price from my card but I still haven't received my order invoice with my order number and tracking details. very upset..I sent a email to them and haven't heard back yet. please help. why didn't I get an invoice when you charged my card the total price of my order. how do i know when the item is shipped when I didn't even get an order number :(
